Hello! My name is Keita (æ™¯å¤ª), but everyone knows me as "Netto Hikari".

I'm the developer of the currently in development go server 3rensei. It's not done yet, but my team and I decided to create this Mastodon instance to create a safe space for go players all over the world!

My wife @Alirrasona and I currently reside in Germany with our two beautiful children.

**A STRANGER IN A STRANGE LAND, CAUGHT IN THE FLOW. STILL SEARCHING FOR ANSWERS AMONG THE NEON LIGHTS.**

âš ï¸ Important!

This is about something I noticed seeping over from other social media to the Fediverse: If you put your alleged mental disorders in your bio and make it your entire personality, please leave me alone. I say "alleged", because unfortunately, faking mental disorders like Autism, ADHD, DID and others is a trend. If you take part in it, go away.

Pointing that out is apparently a problem for many, but I couldn't care less. I'm clarifying this in a pretty reasonable way, without attacking anyone directly. If you still feel attacked by this, I guess I hit a spot.

~~ A STRANGER IN A STRANGE LAND, CAUGHT IN THE FLOW. STILL SEARCHING FOR ANSWERS AMONG THE NEON LIGHTS. ~~
